task_description:
# Complete Domino Pip Detection

Finish implementing domino pip detection to accurately identify pip values on domino tiles. Currently marked as incomplete in the codebase.

## Rationale
Domino pip values are essential puzzle data. Without accurate detection, the solver cannot produce correct solutions. This is a critical gap that blocks full automated puzzle extraction.

## User Stories
- As a Pips player, I want the app to correctly detect domino pip values so that the solution accounts for all constraints

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Pip detection correctly identifies 0-6 pip values on each domino half
- [ ] Detection works with rotated dominoes
- [ ] Handles different domino visual styles and colors
- [ ] Confidence score reflects actual detection accuracy
